title: 突然想了小小的普查一下
author: dpy0428
txt_content: 突然想调查一下论坛用户的年龄

replies.author: 古明地兔
replies.txt_content: 根据自己的一些判断MC作为全年龄段游戏，论坛用户的年龄应该是选项3-6居多

replies.author: liuxuantao1
replies.txt_content: 我是第五项

replies.author: 无界之空
replies.txt_content: 我就看看会不会有人选60以上

replies.author: NoName德里奇
replies.txt_content: MCBBS应该是16-20岁的00后居多吧（猜测）

replies.author: 鹿小语
replies.txt_content: 不聽不聽，我永遠的18歲 XD

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
“小小的”“普查”一下
非常好，这是一句完美的病句

replies.author: wzz0116
replies.txt_content:
无界之空 发表于 2019-5-24 09:58
我就看看会不会有人选60以上
结果有好几个人选

replies.author: 乐园の巫女
replies.txt_content: 为什么还有三个人六十以上，你在开什么鬼玩笑

replies.author: 唯风见影
replies.txt_content: 三选项到6选项 应该比较过  3 和 4的 估计最多

replies.author: 文豪小绝
replies.txt_content: 投60以上你们真的认真的吗

replies.author: Batman服主
replies.txt_content: 这样一看，大部分之初中-高中的 占大多数，其次就是大学生

replies.author: SQwatermark
replies.txt_content: 我觉得你的年龄分段很不合理==

哎，三千年弹指一挥间，
想不到我闭关之后，世间早已沧海桑田，
果真是山中无甲子，修行无岁月

replies.author: Dk__
replies.txt_content: 11-15就我一个吗

replies.author: 无心人书屋
replies.txt_content: 妈耶，60以上的叔叔阿姨们是真的吗。。

replies.author: TheRam_
replies.txt_content: 15，已入坑mc 7年
大家都长大了啊
大家都转大人了
60以上的有4个人投了- -，真是真爱粉啊。

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
投60以上那几个老哥是啥心态啊
据说玩MC可以预防老年痴呆XD

replies.author: yuen27787231
replies.txt_content: 我有到有4個60歲以上的是什麼鬼 老人家還玩遊戲= =

replies.author: 雾洛71
replies.txt_content: 想不到会有60岁以上的人玩

replies.author: zyjking
replies.txt_content: 最后两个选项不合理

replies.author: lin82454
replies.txt_content: 这个60以上可太秀了

replies.author: 云ker大大
replies.txt_content: why你要普查

replies.author: Mike_Play_OK
replies.txt_content: emm…我可以不说吗？

replies.author: kaniol
replies.txt_content: 前两个还没到Minecraft的分级呢。。

replies.author: kuikui851
replies.txt_content: 60以上的 有点恐怖

replies.author: TenmaGabri
replies.txt_content: 233没有吗

replies.author: KISS_DZX
replies.txt_content: 悄咪咪投一票 我觉得我年龄挺大了

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 加油哦楼主

replies.author: 萨菲
replies.txt_content: 初中的和高中的比较多吧

replies.author: aaaaawed
replies.txt_content: 选100的都是神仙吗

replies.author: mr_black_cat
replies.txt_content: MC，小学生总是受到打压，自然少

replies.author: t1546542
replies.txt_content: 我的岁数很低呀……

replies.author: 涩会普云
replies.txt_content: 小年轻人多一点

replies.author: redfish
replies.txt_content: 大叔前来报道

replies.author: HorizonStudio
replies.txt_content: 60以上4个人是认真的吗？0.0

replies.author: 小cheng
replies.txt_content: 哇，我的最高。。。

replies.author: 重石烂
replies.txt_content: 60以上真的是老当益壮啊

replies.txt_content: 4啊   马上大学路过

replies.author: Fish_Ecan
replies.txt_content:
1-5与60以上是神马情况
XDXDXDXD

replies.txt_content:
